AUTH.CANNOT_RETURN_TO_LOGIN: You are currently logged in.  To return to the login page, please log out using the settings page.
AUTH.ERR_LOGIN: Error: Username and password combination are incorrect.
AUTH.ERR_MISSING_DATA: A username and password are required!
AUTH.ERR_NO_PERMISSIONS: This user does not have any permissions.  Please contact a system administrator.
AUTH.TOO_MANY_TRYS: Forgot your username or password? Please ask the system administrator to reset it.
AUTH.UNAUTHENTICATED: You have been logged off.  Please sign back in to resume using the application.
